headline: Tracking William Nygren's Harris Associates Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Harris Associates' 13F portfolio value rose from $59.08B to $76.62B, with 55 significant securities. Read more about the portfolio's holdings and trades in Q3.

headline: APA Corporation Announces Pricing Terms of Cash Tender Offers for Certain Series of Outstanding Apache Corporation Notes
summary: HOUSTON, Dec. 23, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- APA Corporation (“APA”) (Nasdaq: APA) announced today the pricing terms for the previously announced cash tender offers (the “Tender Offers”) to purchase up to $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount (the “Maximum Purchase Amount”) of validly tendered and accepted notes issued by Apache Corporation, its wholly-owned subsidiary (“Apache”), listed in the table below (collectively, the “Apache Tender Notes”). headline: APA Corporation Announces Results of Private Exchange Offers, Tender Offers, and Consent Solicitations at Extended Early Consent Date and Upsizing of Tender Offers
